title: Butterfly (2018 PyeongChang Winter Olympics Special)
lyrics:
Eoliseog-eun sesang-eun neoleul molla
Nue sog-e gamchwojin neoleul mos bwa
Naneun al-a naegen boyeo
Geutolog chanlanhan neoui nalgae
Geobnaeji ma hal su iss-eo

Tteugeobge kkumteulgeolineun

Nalgaeleul pyeo nal-aolla sesang wilo



Taeyangcheoleom bich-eul naeneun geudaeyeo

I sesang-i geochilge mag-aseodo

Bichnaneun salam-a nan neoleul salanghae

Neol sesang-i bol su issge nal-a jeo meolli



Kkeokk-yeobeolin kkochcheoleom apeul ttaedo

Sseuleojin namucheoleom cholahaedo

Neoleul mid-eo naleul mid-eo

Ulineun seololeul midgo iss-eo



Simjang-ui solil neukkyeobwa

Himgyeobge jeob-eonoh-assdeon

Nalgaeleul pyeo nal-aolla sesang wilo



Beogchadolog aleumdaun geudaeyeo

I sesang-i chagabge deung-eul boyeodo

Nunbusin salam-a nan neoleul salanghae

Neol sesang-i bol su issge nal-a jeo meolli



Taeyangcheoleom bich-eul naeneun geudaeyeo

I sesang-i geochilge mag-aseodo

Bichnaneun salam-a nan neoleul salanghae

Neol sesang-i bol su issge nal-a jeo meolli
